Package com.cafean.jobstream.common.util

Class Progress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.jobstream.common.util.Progress
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DownloadProgress
    public abstract class Progress
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for Job Stream progress monitoring. This class serves as the base class for a progress monitoring and error reporting proxy object. Implementations of this class are tasked with directing information about the progress of a task to the user in a manner appropriate to the application.

    For example: The Stream Manager and Execution Wrapper use an instance of of LoggerProgress to redirect file transfer progress to the manager or wrapper log file.

        public abstract void success​(java.lang.String message)

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this Progress without notifying the user or displaying a message. The intended use of this method is to close and discard any user interface elements (dialogs, etc.) being used to display progress information to the user.

        The default implementation notifies all current ProgressListeners

      • incrementValue

        public void incrementValue​(long amount)
        Sets the value to the current value plus the given amount. Note: Extensions of this class may need to override this simple implementation for performance and event notification reasons.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to increment the current progress value by

      • setText

        public abstract void setText​(java.lang.String text)
